item.title: Restore iPhone X from iPhone with iOS 11.2 Beta
item.description: Was your iPhone on the iOS Beta program and you upgraded to iOS 11.2 before getting your iPhone X? Are you now prevented from restoring your old iPhone to your shiny new iPhone X? Follow these steps and you’ll be ready to go in no time. Note: This worked for an iPhone 6s but should work for any iPhone. You might try looking for an ISPW file specific to your model of phone.
